name: IG Australia
description: Australia’s top CFD and FX provider.
overview:
In Australia, we are the number one CFD and FX provider. We service over 140,000 clients globally, making millions of transactions every month.

As a world leader in CFD trading, we offer numerous ways in which you can build knowledge and improve CFD trading skills.

ONLINE VIDEO GUIDES A range of online video guides to help you get the best out of CFD trading.

LOCAL AREA SEMINARS Meet one of our speakers personally by registering for one of our seminars.

EDUCATION PROGRAMME This structured programme is sent via email with all new accounts. It covers placing your first online trade, to ongoing tutorials and much more.

MARKET ANALYSIS Our research team provides daily market analysis and updates to keep you informed of latest events, releases and changes.
